attributes.action: Visa exemption for earthquake victims of Turkey to join their families in UK
attributes.additional_details:
There are currently no temporary visa exemptions to support victims of such event. Families in the UK are very concerned for their loved ones health and safety. 

We urge the UK goverment to provide temporary visa exemptions to earthquake victims of Turkey to join their families in the UK.
attributes.background: The recent earthquake in Turkey has left thousands of people stranded in the freezing cold with very limited shelter and food.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632772
